detail_desc: Sandals with platform soles and lightly padded fabric straps with a hook and loop fastening. Textured soles. Platform front approx. 4.3 cm, back approx. 5.5 cm.
Fitted, smocked top in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a small, overlocked frill trim at the top and hem.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Moccasins in imitation suede with imitation leather details, and tassels and fringes at the front. Twill linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Cardigan in a soft, rib knit with buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Lace suspender belt for holding up nylon stockings. Elastication at the top and an adjustable fastening at the back.
Shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a decorative, tasselled drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Belt in imitation suede decorated with embroidery and small metal studs. Metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Dungarees in woven fabric with buttons at the sides, adjustable straps and fasteners, and front pockets.

Soft, non-wired nursing bras in microfibre with lace details. Lined cups, a wrapover front for easier nursing access and a wide, elasticated hem. No fasteners. The bras are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

Set with a wrapover bodysuit and pair of trousers in a soft organic cotton blend. Jersey bodysuit with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch. Velour trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a deep V-neck, covered buttons at the top, two elasticated seams at the waist and decorative ties at the sides of the hem.
Jumper knitted in supersoft chenille with long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a motif on the front.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Lined at the front. Medium support.
Fitted, single-breasted jacket in twill made from a viscose blend with peak lapels, welt front pockets, covered buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Metal studs in various sizes and designs.
Fitted top in a rib knit with short sleeves.
Short dress in a crinkled weave with glittery stripes and frills. Small opening with ties at the neckline, short, elasticated sleeves with a frill trim, and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Trainers in glittery imitation leather with a padded edge, faux-fur tongue, an adjustable hook and loop tab with an appliqué and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch and an opening with press-studs at one side.

Blouse in airy chiffon with a small stand-up collar and an opening with ties at the top. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with a drawstring at the cuffs. V-neck inner top in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative buttons. Quilted sections at the sides and cuffs, and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
V-neck blouse in a patterned viscose weave with 3/4-length, flounced sleeves and a flounce at the hem.

Set with a hat and pair of mittens in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend. Hat with faux fur pompom on top and ear flaps with ties. Mittens (sizes 0-6 months without thumbs) with fold-down ribbing at the cuffs. Fleece lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif and appliqués on the front and a small slit at the back of the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Dress in soft, patterned cotton corduroy with a seam with decorative gathers at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs, and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Straight-cut blouse in satin crêpe with a small stand-up collar with decorative appliqués. Opening with hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with cuffs and covered buttons.
Slim-fit, denim-look leggings in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist.
Short top in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-shaped neckline with decorative buttons down the front, and smocking at the back.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, straight legs.
Short-sleeved leotard in soft jersey with a tulle skirt and sleeves, and press-studs at the crotch.
Shorts in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the front, a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and diagonal side pockets.
Smartphone bag in sturdy fabric with a narrow, metal chain shoulder strap and flap with a magnetic fastener and decorative metal detail. Depth 3.5 cm. Width 10 cm. Height 16.5 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and legs with seams and narrow hems.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, side pockets, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Strapless bandeau bras in cotton jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and side support.

Skeleton set with a hoodie in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and pair of jersey leggings. Top with a lined hood, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Calf-length skirt in an airy, patterned weave with a high, gathered waist and concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam at the hips for added width. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Two-button jacket in a textured linen and cotton weave with a decorative chest pocket, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a small, fleece-lined stand-up collar and detachable, faux-fur trimmed hood. Zip with a chin guard at the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and an elasticated hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Cotton canvas hi-tops with a hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Sporty jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem.

Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and imitation suede belt. Chest pocket with a button, side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a tab and button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif, wrapover jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports bralette in microfibre and mesh. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust, a racer back with a cut-out section, and a wide elastic hem. Medium support.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.
Longer, off-the-shoulder top in a fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Double layer at the top, long sleeves and gathered side seams for best fit.
Shirt in an airy weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a knit containing some wool with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Striped, long-sleeved top in sturdy cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, a small chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Swim top with a print motif and contrasting colour sections at the sides. Stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Pull-on trousers in washed, stretch twill with an elasticated, drawstring waist, front pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Short, fitted dress in stretch velour with a V-neck, wrapover and long sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. Wide elastication and gathers around the top and long sleeves with frilled cuffs.
Fleece-lined jacket in a patterned weave with a stand-up collar, detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned slub jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with visible seams and raw edges around the neckline and cuffs.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated neckline and raglan cap sleeves.

Set in soft organic cotton. Four bodysuits in jersey with press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Two with short sleeves and two with long sleeves. Two pairs of trousers and two long-sleeved tops in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Tops with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal rings in various designs with faceted plastic stones.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details in a looser fit with a regular waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour stripes down the sides, an elasticated drawstring waist and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, one back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with twisted side seams and narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Fitted top in sturdy jersey with a sweetheart neckline, and 3/4-length puff sleeves with gathers and elastication around the shoulders for extra volume.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Short-sleeved polo shirt knitted in a linen blend with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
